'''''Ignited Treasure Hunter (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open 160 [[Chest]]s in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]].
